page.title: 10CHANGING TIMES PETT LEVEL
page.content: {STOCK:}This is basically a sheep and beef cattle area.Small upland farms rear stock, fattened on the marsh in summer.There are now more sheep than cattle,mostly Kent sheep, sometimes crossed Dorset Down.Formerly were sold as fat lambs or 'hoggets' at 1 year. There is more stock to the acre than say 40 years ago.Greatest change in animal husbandry since 1945 is the vast increase in{veterinary knowledge and resultant improved health of animals. {CROPS:}Plant breeding techniques and impetus in research have revolutionised the business of ley farming. {MECHANISATION}may not have improved the method of farm husbandry but has replaced expensive labour, man.Some of the heart and character of farming has gone with him.
